description:
Most adorable pair of overalls by Carters, marked a size 12 months. They run much smaller and appear to be more suitable for 6-9 months old. Please refer very carefully to my measurements below though to ensure proper fit.  Two blue buttons at the shoulders to fastens the straps to the bib and snap-ups between the legs.

This item is in a very good vintage condition!

name: Vintage 70's dark-blue toddler snow/winter suit
description:
A cute little snow suit. Jacket is double-breasted with an elasticated hood for extra snugness inside and to keep the nasty cold wind outside. Hood is also lined with and extra soft plush fabric.
The suit is lightly padded and lined with a soft cream brushed cotton. The trousers are pull on with an elasticated waist.

This suit is in an excellent vintage condition ! NEW and unworn. Though it has been stored in a warehouse for many years it will need to be washed before wearing to remove any surface dirt.

Size: The suit is sized "36", which is around Age 2. The trousers are quite large on the legs and slightly longer than some of the other items that have in the same size, so I'm guessing they are designed to be worn over other trousers.
To ensure a proper fit, check measurements below. Please note that all measurements are taken from the outside so please allow some extra space.

Trousers

Inseam: 30cm (12")

Coat

description:
Very simple but oh so adorable tunic made out of blue corduroy. White piping at neckline, armopening and around the two (fake) patch pockets in the front.
Fastens with with 4 buttons in the back. 
Easy to wear in so many different ways. My favorite must be with a white (or black) turtleneck, white (or black) tights, ankle high Doc. Martens and two piggy-tails!

The coat has matching mittens which are attached to a cord so little hands can not loose them. The mittens are not attached to the coat so they can be removed if they are not needed. The fabric is lightweight but warm, coat is fully lined both the hood and the mittens are elasticated for extra snugness!

This coat is in an excellent vintage condition ! NEW and unworn. Though it has been stored in a warehouse for many years it will need to be washed before wearing to remove any surface dirt.

name: Vintage Rothshield grey wool winter coat
description:
Vintage wool coat in pink(-ish) and black plaid by Rothschild. Late 1980s. Wool is thick and warm. Double breasted styling with full, multi gored skirt. Black velvet collar. Black velvet bows at waist sides and again at back center. Puffed sleeves at shoulder. Coat has a lovely Dickens era look to it. Lining is black acetate with felt backing for warmth. Really sweet and timeless. Buttons show a slight bit of wear but there are 2 new replacements buttons sewn to coat lining. Coat is in otherwise great condition. 

Size: US size 2T. Measurements listed below.

shoulder to shoulder: 30cm (12")
